entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
